original_text: And the children of Israel smote them not, because the princes of the congregation had sworn unto them by the Lord God of Israel. And all the congregation murmured against the princes.
korean_text: 그러나 회중 족장들이 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와로 그들에게 맹세했기 때문에 이스라엘 자손이 그들을 치지 못한지라 그러므로 회중이 다 족장들을 원망하니

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel smote them not
because the princes of the congregation had sworn unto them
by the Lord God of Israel
And all the congregation murmured against the princes
